props.name: id
props.docblock: An html id attribute, necessary for accessibility.

description.text: An html id attribute, necessary for accessibility.

props.name: placement
props.docblock:
Sets the direction the Popover is positioned towards.

This is generally provided by the `Overlay` component positioning the popover.

description.text:
Sets the direction the Popover is positioned towards.

This is generally provided by the `Overlay` component positioning the popover.

props.name: title
props.docblock:
When this prop is set, it creates a `Popover` with
a `Popover.Title` inside passing the children directly to it.

description.text:
When this prop is set, it creates a `Popover` with
a `Popover.Title` inside passing the children directly to it.

props.name: arrowProps
props.docblock:
An `Overlay` injected set of props for positioning the popover arrow.

This is generally provided by the `Overlay` component positioning the popover.

description.text:
An `Overlay` injected set of props for positioning the popover arrow.

This is generally provided by the `Overlay` component positioning the popover.

props.name: content
props.docblock:
When this prop is set, it creates a `Popover` with
a `Popover.Content` inside passing the children directly to it.

description.text:
When this prop is set, it creates a `Popover` with
a `Popover.Content` inside passing the children directly to it.

props.name: popper
props.docblock: A `Popper.js` config object passed to the the underlying popper instance.

description.text: A `Popper.js` config object passed to the the underlying popper instance.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

description.text: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

description.text: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name
